findings.title: Flashloan Attack
findings.description: When working with exchange rates, they should be received from a trusted source and not be vulnerable to short-term rate changes that can be achieved by using flash loans. Oracles should be used.

findings.title: Token Supply Manipulation
findings.description: Tokens can be minted only according to rules specified in a whitepaper or any other documentation provided by the Customer.

findings.title: Inconsistencies in NatSpec specification
findings.description: The implementation of some functions and events does not adhere to its NatSpec specification, causing confusion and making it harder for auditors and developers to understand the code.

findings.title: AssignmentChanged: missing parameter
findings.description: The changeAssignment() function lacks a necessary parameter.

findings.title: TokensSwapped: wrong NatSpec format
findings.description: The implementation of some functions and events does not adhere to its NatSpec specification.

findings.title: PoolFeeSet: wrong poolFee parameter description
findings.description: Inconsistencies between implementation and NatSpec specification can cause confusion and make it harder for auditors and developers to understand the code.

findings.title: changeAssignment(): missing assignmentString parameter
findings.description: The changeAssignment() function lacks an assignmentString parameter.

findings.title: Redundant View Functions
findings.description: The following functions return state variables that are already public, and thus can already be read without creating additional functions.
